description: Slavs are a civilization that excels in infantry and farming.
dark_age: Start with 3 villagers, a scout, and a farm.
Build 2 houses, a lumber camp near forests, and a mining camp near gold and stone.
Train additional villagers from the town center.
Build a barracks and train 3-4 militia.
Use the scout to explore the map and find resources.
Advance to Feudal Age at around 21-22 minutes with 500 food and 200 gold.
Have around 800-1000 food, 150-200 wood, and 150-200 gold at the end of the Dark Age.
Assign 4-5 villagers to food, 2-3 to wood, 1-2 to gold, and 3-4 to stone.
feudal_age: Build additional farms and train more militia from the barracks.
Research Double-bit Axe and Horse Collar at the mill to increase farming efficiency.
Build a blacksmith and upgrade infantry and farming technologies.
Advance to Castle Age at around 27-28 minutes with 800 food and 400 gold.
Have around 1500-2000 food, 600-800 wood, 500-600 gold, and 400-500 stone at the end of the Feudal Age.
Assign 8-10 villagers to food, 5-6 to wood, 3-4 to gold, and 6-7 to stone.
castle_age: Train more infantry from the barracks, including unique unit Boyars.
Build a siege workshop and produce rams and mangonels.
Research Sappers and Siege Engineers at the university.
Advance to Imperial Age at around 34-35 minutes with 1000 food, 1000 gold, and 800 stone.
Have around 3500-4000 food, 2000-2500 wood, 1200-1500 gold, and 1200-1500 stone at the end of the Castle Age.
Assign 20-25 villagers to food, 10-12 to wood, 8-10 to gold, and 12-15 to stone.
imperial_age: Continue producing infantry and siege units, and research Blast Furnace at the blacksmith.
Use siege units and infantry to destroy enemy buildings and push through defenses.
Research Druzhina at the castle to give infantry splash damage.
Have around 5000-6000 food, 3000-4000 wood, and 3000-4000 gold in the late Imperial Age.
Assign 40-50 villagers to food, 20-25 to wood, 16-20 to gold, and 25-30 to stone.
